name: Ffionaâ€™s Restaurant
address: 51 Kensington Church Street, London W8 4BA, United Kingdom
author: Seth R.
description:
A great little place not far from Kensington Palace. Warm, cozy and inviting. After reading the reviews I had to try it before dashing off to the airport. They open at 6pm, so I called at 5:30, said I was one, and it was no problem. I was the first person in the door and was welcomed and seated and we got started right away. Fiona explained the menu with gusto and a no-nonsense confidence. I started with the fig and goat cheese salad. Light, tasty, beautifully dressed. Next I opted for the famous Chicken Kiev, which was perfectly
executed. The chicken was fried perfectly, juicy on the inside, with a beautiful garlic butter sauce oozing out from the inside. Did have room for dessert.

Don't miss it if you are in the area. Make sure you book, this place is hot!
